Title: Reflex Flower Bouquet Design Ladies 30" Silve Tone Necklace Pendant Watch PEND31
Description: Reflex Flower Bouquet Design Ladies 30" Silve Tone Necklace Pendant Watch PEND31 Swipe Left / Right to see more images Item Description Payment Shipping Returns Item Description An elegant and smart pendatn watch by Reflex, this is a high functioning fashion timepiece which will serve you well, suitable for every day and occasion wear. This watch is the ideal gift for her. Product Features: * 30" Silver Tone Metal Chain Included. * Multi Flower Design Case Shield. * Manufacturers Guarantee. * Reflex Presentation Tin. * Diameter of Dial: 2.5cm. Also Comes With: * 1 Years Manufacuturers Guarantee. Radio Controlled. Accurate Time. Automatically adjusts in the UK only. 30M Water Resistant. Arabic Numerals. Luminous Hands. Crocodile Effect Strap. Strap length The watch fastens with a buckle on any of the 8 holes. Watch length from one end of the strap to the other: 24.5cm. Watch length when fastened on the tightest hole: 17.5cm. Watch length when fastened on the loosest hole: 22.5cm. Also comes with: Guarantee. Precision Presentation Box. --> Item Specification Brand Reflex Model number PEND31 Item shape Round Display type Analogue Clasp Not specified Case material Metal Case diameter 25 mm Case thickness 7 mm Band material Metal Band width 0 mm Band color Silver Dial color White Movement Quartz Warranty type 12 months manufacturer's warranty (unless otherwise stated in the item description) For your own peace of mind and for buyer protection, we only accept payment through PayPal. Credit card (Visa, Eurocard/Master card, Amex, and switch or Visa/Delta) Payment can be accepted ONLY through PayPal (you don’t need a PayPal account). Please make payment within 3 days of purchase. We offer fast dispatch on all items.Orders placed and paid before 3:00p.m.will usually be shipped the same day. Free delivery on most items sent in U.K. U.K. orders will be sent via Royal Mail. Estimated delivery time 3-5 working days Express next day delivery in U.K. is available for a minimal extra charge. E.U.orders will be sent via Royal Mail air mail or international signed for. Estimated delivery time 3-7 working days. Rest of the world orders will be sent via Royal Mail international signed for. Estimated delivery time 6-10 working days. There is no carrier collection on Saturday, Sunday and Bank holidays. International buyers are responsible for their foreign taxes/duties. We accept returns if the item is returned as new with all original packaging as we sent it out to you. We will happily refund the full price of the item, once it has been returned and checked. Return postage is only refunded if we are at fault or the item arrives damaged or faulty. The item must be returned to us, in its original condition, within 7 days of you receiving it. A refund will be issued within 5 working days of receipt of the returned item. For all returns please contact us via eBay messages or call 0161-740-1747 so that we can arrange a returns case for you, complete with the returns address and number, in order to speed up the refund process for you. We advise you to use recorded delivery, or a delivery service that can be tracked and traced, as parcels that do not arrive back to us cannot be refunded by us. Please contact us before leaving any negative feedback and enable us to rectify any problems with your order. If in doubt, contact us via the eBay message system before buying. Please note that for reasons of hygiene we do not accept the return of earrings for pierced ears or clip-on's under any circumstances unless faulty. Christmas extended returns policy: Purchases made on or after the 16th December will be eligible for a refund up until 8th January inclusive. Please ensure that all items are received back in our offices by 8th January.
